name: Chopped: A call from the pig
name_original: Chopped: A call from the pig
description:
This game is an excercise for Game Design degree in University of Girona.

The game is about a wizard's who stolen his pig Chopped, your objective is solve the different puzzles to reach the wizard who stole your beauty pig.

Stage is divided in boxes where can be, flag (win), enemies, potions or magic ball. When you move 1 box all of this will move 1 box too.

Controls

  • Arrows: move
  • W A S D: throw magic ball
